## UserAgentCore.invite() method

Send INVITE.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | <code>OutgoingRequestMessage</code> | Outgoing request. |
|  delegate | <code>OutgoingInviteRequestDelegate</code> | Request delegate. |
